title: Relates to the disclosure of medical records and clinical records
summary: Establishes certain charges and fees authorized relative to requests for inspections and copying of medical records shall be deemed to be reasonable production expenses.

   18    (a) A subpoena requiring attendance or a subpoena duces tecum shall be

   18  of records is required in order to comply with a  subpoena,  the  person
